definition: to be disloyal (to one's country, spouse etc)/to lose one's chastity
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]

sentences.english: You have to choose between death and dishonor.
sentences.chinese: 你須在死與失節間做一選擇。

sentences.english: He had to choose between death and dishonour.
sentences.chinese: 他必須在死與失節之間做出抉擇。

sentences.english: Othello. Give me a living reason she's disloyal.
sentences.chinese: 奧瑟羅給我一個充分的理由，證明她已經失節。
